See LICENSE.txt for license information.

For the most recent version of Goldie, visit:
	http://www.semitwist.com/goldie/
	
For online documentation for this version of Goldie, visit:
	http://www.semitwist.com/goldie/v0.9/
	
For local documentation, see:
	{main goldie directory}/docs/index.html

Note: Local docs are only prebuilt in prepackaged releases.
To build them manually, run the 'makeDocs' script.

A specially-enhanced version of JsonViewer is included as a convenience,
although it is not officially part of Goldie.
The main JsonViewer executable is here:
    {main goldie directory}/JsonViewer/JsonView.exe
